website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and warmth makes these an UGG favorite. Easy to slip on and quick to get off, they won't slow you down.
pros: Keep your feet warm and cozy
Sheepskin sockliner wicks away moisture to keep feet dry
cons: The lining sometimes rubs off on the heel, and they run large

customer_reviews.title: Fake uggs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these slippers 2mo and the fur sole has worn away in both heals. This is not typical ugg wear. I’ve owned multiple UGG slippers and this is never happened before. For the price you pay you expect UGG slippers to last a while and usually they do. The moment I got the slippers they did not feel as sturdy as my other UGG slippers. Please be careful in buying these slippers. I’ve added a photo of my worn heal on one of the slippers, poorly made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is UGHHHH instead of UGG
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an UGG lover for years and always happy with their quality. My last UGG slippers I had for years and I finally let them go when purging during a big relocation. Bought these new ones in September to have ready to go when the cold season arrived. I’ve used them around the house for little over a month now and they are completely torn apart, inseams cut, the insoles with holes. I am shocked and disappointed beyond words! Can these be genuine UGG slippers after all? To pay over $100 for this level of disappointment. Wow...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Uggs in this style. With my first two pairs, I was very satisfied (hence my habit to replace them when needed). Unfortunately this pair lost the fur instantly, leaving fuzzies all over my home and after about 5 weeks there was a large spot worn off at the heel. I'm wondering if this was a fake pair as I never experienced this before. Very disappointed, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, will fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. This is my second purchase of this same style of UGGs from Zappos. Not sure what is going on with the slipper but ordered these as an early Christmas present and it’s only the first week of February and already the sole is falling apart. I have owned this same slipper five times and am accustomed to the sole falling apart after 8-12 months but less than 60 days later, this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle March

customer_reviews.title: Fake UGGs
customer_reviews.text: These are not real UGGs they are knock offs fake. You can tell if you know what real UGGs are like it’s so clear these are FAKE!
customer_reviews.author: SkylarBlue

customer_reviews.title: Feel like cheap knock offs
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these from ugg 5 years ago and they are my favorite ( so soft, good arch support) BUT these pair felt like a cheap knock of pair. They are not to say BAD. But they were no where near the quality my other pair were. If you need a good pair of slippers, get them. But if you want GREAT pay the extra 30$ for the legit ones from UGG.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the slippers, but after only wearing for 2 days the inside padding in the heel area has a small 'worn' down hole. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Really like these slippers
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews on this product, I was a bit reluctant to order. I was concerned that many stated the shoes were counterfeit Uggs. I already have a pair if these slippers, but I’ve had them for years and needed a new pair. I decided to try my luck and order. I’m glad I did. The shoes are the real deal. There are instructions on how to tell if your shoes may be counterfeit. Plus, Amazon is not a recognized counterfeit seller. If you want a pair, order them. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bronze about it.
customer_reviews.text: I always love an UGG slipper. And I will keep this one since it was on sale. Unfortunately it is sort of a baby poop yellowish color. Not bronze at all. This reminds me to either order from Nordstrom or from the UGG website. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: These are not the Ugg Coquette slippers I have grown to love. Every so often, I replace my slippers after they've become too worn. I sent back this replacement pair. They are not as soft, the new "security tag" is itchy, and they just weren't as comfortable. New Ugg slippers should feel like your feet get a nice warm hug at the end of the day...I miss my hug.
customer_reviews.author: Alison's

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed!!!! The fur inside heel started falling out almost immediately! I purchased 2 pair, the tan from another seller, and they are as expected. THIS PAIR however was worn less often and I believe to be a cheap imitation. Too expensive for this result, and I failed to return before the 30 days. Hence the expression, Ugg 😖
customer_reviews.author: Tami D.

customer_reviews.title: UGG none other than the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I love UGG bedroom slippets.My original pair are the brown..I needed a replacement pair of shoes to wear in the house, Looked them up in Amazon n here we are..I like the sky blue color, there doesnt seem to be as much foot padding as my other pair..I did get the sealing spray for the suede outer..I normally wear a wide so I ordered up a 1/2 size- they fit fine..zit could use arch support in the bed..Love the color..I have worn my original pair outside -to get the mail,drive to corner store etc..
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVe these...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair of slippers. I had my first pair for about a year. I wore them all throughout the day. You could go outside in them bc the soles are so thick. They are so fluffy and soft, but my heel wore out and there was nothing there. The slippers did stretch more then I thought they would have in a year, but it was so comfortable breaking them in!! I bought a second pair bc I hated that my heel wore down and my slippers were so stretch out they became too big for my foot. It would always slip off my foot. But I love them still!!
customer_reviews.author: JanineD

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - too bad
customer_reviews.text: This would've been my third pair of Ugg Coquette slippers. They are so expensive and wear out in two years tops (which would be fine if they weren't so expensive) but I just can't find anything else I like as well. Why the 2 stars? This last pair I just received were so cheaply made I could tell right away that they would be worn out in under three months. The material on the footbed was so thin that I could already see straight through to the backing. Sadly, I've sent them back and am not sure what I'm going to do now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: Don't be shy guys!
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago an older male surgeon friend of mine presented me with slippers just like these, the same he wore every single winter day around the house. After he had passed away my slippers also slowly started falling apart. Looking for another pair I could not find them anywhere online. Little clue did I have they were WOMEN'S slippers. Ha Ha, sly dog, my old, sensitive skin, surgeon friend, frequenting the women's section and selection without any shame. I decided to follow in his footsteps and do just the same. Ordering beautiful fluffy UGG women's slippers for my own sensitive guy's feet. Love them, adore them!
customer_reviews.author: BlüMüsiK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been spoiled with UGG slippers for over 10 years now. My first and second pair lasted me about 5 years. That's of in and outdoor daily usage. The only negative thing I have to say about them is that the black rubs off on your feet so I recommend the chestnut or any other color. I actually returned the black specifically for that reason and am reordering the chestnut color now. I typically wear size 9.5-10 in footwear and I find the size 10 are a little big but I like the extra room in my slippers. I am an UGG slipper wearer for life lol. I highly recommend these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this kind of slippers. They are comfortable and great for "house" shoes. I wear them around the house, but if I run to check the mail or take out the trash, they are good to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dreis

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in these slippers. I've owned one other pair and they lasted for several years. These I've had for 3 months, have never worn outside, sole looks brand new, leather looks brand new..but the wool on one foot is completely gone on the bottom and one side.The bare bottom is sticky and makes it very uncomfortable to wear. I own several pairs of Uggs in different styles and have never had this happen. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: StaceyCMcc

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UGG slippers sold at true UGG price
customer_reviews.text: Just as other reviewers have also stated, the slippers that I received are NOT REAL UGGS. The quality is terrible; the fur feels like a cheap plasticy-synthetic and you can see the foam backing around the top, the faux-suede is rough, and the slippers are overall far too light-weight. I was looking to buy replace these exact slippers, having already out-worn a pair that was bought at Nordstrom which were undeniably real. I'm incredibly disappointed. The seller in my case says these were from "Amazon.com Services LLC". Don't waste your money. If you want these slippers, buy them from UGG directly. Suffice to say, I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This are comfortable and very cute but to me they run big i order size 7 that usually my size and the were to big so i order size 6 and fit perfect. Updated the fur from the slipper already came of from one part i dont know if they original.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra frias

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as the old coquette style
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by the weight of the slippers. They are VERY light compared to the pair I had before (maybe 5 years old?). I just got them at the beginning of March this year and wear them most days around the house. I'll probably need to replace the insoles in the next month as the wool has already become very matted causing the slippers to feel a bit larger and less warm. I ordered a size down because UGGs run big. In general, they are UGGs and are soft with good traction on the soles, however, they feel much cheaper than I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these. They wear out just like any shoe. The fur wears off because you're putting your giant fat foot on it. Can't believe that's a problem for people. "These didn't last 15 years, I'm so disappointed..." Yeah, you're stupid. Anyway.... We buy a pair every 2 years, and then in between sometimes put in new insole fur. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Keith Jr

customer_reviews.title: The brand name Ugg no longer means top quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some Ugg slippers at a department store about four years ago, so I expected quality, especially for the high price. As much as I loved them, they were beginning to wear at the heel. So, In the past two months, I've purchased two new pair of Ugg slippers through Amazon. The first pair, only months old, is already starting to wear at the heel. As for the second pair, the sole feels thinner than the first. Bottom line: Too much money for such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: bonniebaker

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my SO. After about 30 seconds she was able to determine they were fake, and after closer review they looked like slippers from the dollar store. Tags were wrong, lining felt cheap and the stitching on the sole was fake. This is a common problem on amazon with higher end or designer stuff - this is not the first time I have been burned, but it will be the last time I buy something like this on amazon. Not cool Amazon, not cool.
customer_reviews.author: sllewe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for her birthday in Feb. 2020, so she didn't wear them much last winter and just put them on this week as the weather is getting cooler. The entire side of one of the slippers ripped out when she turned the corner to go down the stairs. As you can see the inside material is completely broken down in just a few times. Not happy with the quality. Not sure what happened to UGG’s but these are not the same quality as her older pair. I have added pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN for your Feet
customer_reviews.text: Heaven. My feet are in heaven. I love the Coquette Ugg slippers. Easy on and off. Keeps the toes snug and warm and the soles of the slippers are hard enough to walk to get the mail without wearing out. This is my 3rd pair in 15 years only because I lost my last pair. The port wine color is simply beautiful. I will take a bit more care with these since they are a wine color vs my usual black. Cant wait for them mold to my feet! No they are not tight it’s just how they do after awile. THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: The inside is absolutely comfortable from a bare foot in slipper point of view
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be well made. The inside is absolutely comfortable from a bare foot in slipper point of view. However, and the reason for the deduction of 1.5 stars (if we were able to do half a star). The cushioning between the liner and the sole itself is, well, lacking. I mean, it's not a deal breaker, however, I do feel given the price, a little more effort and material could have been given to create at least a detectable spongy cushion effect. Other than that, at least until the inside wool laps together, it fits quite nicely and is comfy. The grip on the bottom rather than your typical smooth (with small bumps) surface is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: The Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the old days
customer_reviews.text: So the original company UGG made their boots with authentic sheep shearling inside. They’ve lasted so long that I just now have had to replace my slippers. What a disappointment! There is no softness, no cushion. This fake, thin shearling doesn’t even offer soft comfort. When walking in the slippers they feel “hard”, not soft. Will not be spending this kind of money again on UGG’s. There are many other company’s that use authentic, natural materials for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawgstarr

customer_reviews.title: Great support,tread, wonderfully comfortable, no slipping, indoor, outdoor wear as needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of UGG Coquette slippers. I bought a cheaper brand in between my first and second pair. No comparison to the support, long life of my UGGs. Inside, sometimes all day, one of the first things I change into when I arrive home but outdoors as well for errands such as walking to my mailbox, taking out my garbage. No concern regarding wet feet, slipping related to inadequate tread. I love them! I will never trade!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price anymore — quality compromised
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning these slippers & one other pair of Uggs ordered. Neither has the provided arch support previous years’ versions have and the “sheepskin” has been replaced with a more matted down silkier material (synthetic like comparatively). Paid the extra for authentic Uggs after buying a pair for my sister in LV and finding same issues: flat non-supportive sole, no arch support and not as nice quality sheepskin. Unsure what Uggs is going for now, but not worth the $$ and this newer version puts Uggs in the more generic, thinner soled class with the many knock-offs. Disappointed for the gift I had hoped to share & for myself for future — will look to Merrills next
customer_reviews.author: Tom or Lori

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. Don’t be fooled. I read reviews and thought they must be real. They arrived and I could tell something was off - fleece just not quite thick enough, bottoms seemed light. Yes after one month the soles are worn off. I’ve owned Ugg slippers for 10 years and these are more worn in a month than my old ones that are 18 months old. Total fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fur falling off of slippers within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of UGG slippers, boots, etc. and never had a pair loose inside fur within a week or so. The slipper is basically falling apart and am very disappointed with the quality of this slipper. In the past, my UGG slippers normally last at least a year or more. I am not sure if these are from UGGs and next time, I will order these slippers directly from the company.
customer_reviews.author: susan stewart

customer_reviews.title: very comfy but watch out for the black dye
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and warm. I love Uggs. Like other reviewers have said, the black ones have been getting black dye all over my feet for the past few weeks so couldn't give them 5 stars. The ink does come off my skin in the shower, but I sometimes have to get rubbing alcohol/nail polish remover to get the rest off of my toenails. An update... this is winter #2 with these slippers and they are still getting black dye on my feet! I don't wear them much of the year as I live in Arizona. I don't think I will ever get another pair of Uggs with black fur again
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: You CAN replace the insoles
customer_reviews.text: Mine look a bit ratty, right? That’s because I’ve been wearing them about 360 days a year for the last 7 years (I work from home, so I mean ALL day). I get new insoles once a year. My slippers are a size 8, so I buy size 8 UGG insoles. I slide the new insole in and secure it under the heel section with a piece of folded over duct tape. It holds all year. Best slippers ever. I’ll never go without them if I can help it. Note that these slippers run large compared to UGG boots. I wear an 8 in the slippers and a 9 I’m the classic boots.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Clear Sky

customer_reviews.title: Love my UGGs
customer_reviews.text: I knew these ran big so I ordered a size down. They are perfect, comfy & super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are real sheepswool. Felt cheap and synthetic- uncomfortable- no arch support- I returned them -am waiting for a pair of dearfoams- these uggs don't stand up to the name.
customer_reviews.author: Becky-Loo Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality lining
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these slippers less than one month and the fuzzy lining on the inside of the left shoe has completely wore off at the heel and is beginning to do the same on the right shoe. I’m extremely disappointed since these slippers were so dang expensive. I was hoping for a replacement pair, but missed the return by one day, ah!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but a bit smaller than boots
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8 in the classic tall boots, however I figured this being a slip-on to order up. So I purchased a size 9 and I feel as if they are always ready to fall off. Not at all secure or snug on my foot. I actually take them off if I’m carrying anything as I don’t want to trip. So far not a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these house shoes! They’re insanely comfortable like any ugg boots, I like that you can replace the insert, and of course the quality is as expected! I usually wear a size 8.5 in ugg boots, I did buy a size 9 in these. They fit really well with some extra room on the end, which was something I wanted for extra comfort
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love my Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these slippers for me. The first time I tried them on, my heel came right up to the edge. I considered exchanging them for a bigger size, but I decided to wear them inside for a few days to see if they would stretch out a bit. After wearing them a few times, they did stretch out and the fit was more comfortable. They are warm and cozy and my favorite thing to wear around the house. They are very well made, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good slipper, but great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love how warm and comfortable these slippers are, however I use them as slip on shoes when the weather starts to turn cooler. Couldn't give them 5 stars because I expected them to have a soft sole (like most slippers). They actually have hard rubber soles not even as flexible as athletic shoes. I can't wear them indoors because they catch on carpets because of the soles. If however you want a comfy, warm slip on shoe for fall and early winter I wouln't hesitate to get them. I love mine. Also, from past experience with UGG I knew to get them the next size up because UGGs run small.
customer_reviews.author: riley1

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, feel great to wear
customer_reviews.text: The color called bronzer is kind of a weird color. It’s more tan plus rose gold color. Super soft and luxurious feeling to wear. I usually wear a size 9 but an 8 in these fit me just fine, even a little bit generous.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Wear out very quickly, read the other reviews to verify. The quality does not match the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love how these slippers fit, and they are supportive and comfortable (when they are new). However, this is my second pair and I’m super disappointed in how quickly they wear out on the insole, especially around the heel. The slippers are only worn around the house in the morning and evening before and after work. The quality is very poor, not worth the money. The pair in the first photo have only been worn for TWO MONTHS! The second photo is five months of wear. The lining of the sole is not the same wool as the upper. For this price, the quality is very poor. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EllenSilkPerry

customer_reviews.title: These are not real Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Uggs. I literately search my orders and hit by again on the button next to my old UGGs. When these arrived I put them on and I could immediately tell the difference. They are not the same UGGs. They do not have the support, the sole is completely different, and fur does not feel the same. I immediately returned them as recognizing them as fake as soon as I put them on. I only hope they are fake and that the real UGGs did not change manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two pairs of UGG Slippers both lasting well over a year, I am so disappointed by this product! I have worn for just over a month and the heels are completely worn through. I did give this product two stars because I like the sole of the slipper, and they where comfortable at first. These are not UGG quality I am used to. I would not recommend these to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jade L.

customer_reviews.title: Soft + Comfy but RUNS LARGE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned two pairs of classic Ugg boots before purchasing this pair of slippers, and loved them. I thought these would be super cute, comfy, and practical around the house for the winter months. Definitely order a size down. I’m normally a Size 8 and that was too large in this slipper - it fits like a 9/10 with a lot of room at the back.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Real comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet and knew these might be a bit long, which they are but they are very snug and comfortable. I don't care that they are a bit long, as I only wear them inside. I had another pair that I got from the Rack, which fit great and I wanted a replacement since I wore the toe sole out, as I frag my toes a bit after an injury. No complaints here because these are great slippers.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY WICKERSHAM

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair before . They are comfortable, cozy and fit great. You can where them in doors and run to get the mail. They will get smelly if you where them all time without socks. I wrecked them by wearing them in the summer . In Georgia heat but they were still good for about 6 years. I tried some other copycats without success. So glad to have my comfy slippers back
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these slippers a year ago and reordered them this year. The Ugg company has a great reputation for high quality and I'm happy to pay their high prices for really good quality. However, I am totally shocked at how shabby this new pair is. The floor of the slipper feels like cardboard and there is very little sheepskin padding. I've only had them three weeks and they're already looking and feeling very old. I would return them if I could. Do not buy this slipper!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cook

customer_reviews.title: I have had mine for over 13 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these UGGs since college. They have held up over the years through everything. Summer, Winter, Fall, Spring. I wear them year round inside and outside and I loveeeeeeee them. I still have my old pair for bumming around but figured it was time for a new pair after 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: LillyBee

customer_reviews.title: I own 12 pair; 3 styles of UGGs...this is my first  in this style
customer_reviews.text: Heaven. Been waiting for these to go on sale anywhere for 3 years. Not happening. Convenientt for running to the rec center to change clothes to swim. Easy peasey for running errands. Look great (not like slippers) with tights. So comfy I ordered the chestnut color. Better arch than UGG Classics...not as much arch as UGG Ultimate. Nice thick sole to absorb impact from concrete.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMaryDallasMary

customer_reviews.title: Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: PROS: • Thick rubber sole. • Warm. • Easy slip-on. • Cute. CONS: • The “fluff” wears down quickly. • The inside the slipper “fluff” is already packed down & starting to rub off after only a couple months. • Stain easily. • No arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Angi Kaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Tend to flop off
customer_reviews.text: They tend to flop off so not a great summer slipper. The soles are nice since my dogs go out and wrap themselves around a tree and I have to go out in the mud and get them untangled - so there's that! Nice color - nice fleece- can be warm which I don't even notice in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: I love Jesus

customer_reviews.title: 31 days and heel is almost completely bare
customer_reviews.text: my daughter received these one month and one day ago and the lining on the heels is almost completely gone... didn't notice the issue until today, which is one day past ability to return. Several of us in the family have had this time of slipper numerous time and have never had this issue. Would strongly suggest watching the wear of these slipper if you decide to spend the $100+ on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Above my expectations
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were recommend by my Dr after foot surgery, and they have become my most comfortable shoes. They provide a soft, snug, supporting fit, and the ease of use make them a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Worse slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were a tremendous disappointment. They were expensive & fit like work boots. I hate them. They are huge for stated size. I wear a 8 and these seem like 9 1/2. I should have sent them back. The soles are very thick & heavy with deep treads. When I take my dogs out in them, I bring gravel stuck in the treads into the house. They weigh a lot & force you to slog around in them. I’m giving them to Goodwill!
customer_reviews.author: Lab Lover

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing ugg products since the late 70's and have always loved them. I find the price too high, but with a Christmas amazon gift card I decided to purchase these. When they arrived I noticed they lining seemed less thick than the old ones I have. But, I decided to keep them anyway. Then I noticed that the seam on top of one of the slippers was open. I question if these are real uggs or a knock off. If they are real then I am not happy with this new product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Wearing away on left heel
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of these for a long time and I bought them in January 2020 and it is now the beginning of June and on the left heel the fur is totally worn away. Not very happy about this. I own other UGG styles like the boots etc., but always wanted a pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Teenage daughter loves these slippers so much!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter to keep cozy and warm during remote learning. She loves them so much! She normally wears a size 8.5 or 9. Based on other reviews saying these run large, we bought her a size 8 in these and they fit perfectly. They’re stylish and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSuburbMom

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers but run large
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but this is my third pair of these slippers over several years and I've always been a size 7. This time, I was swimming in the 7 and had to exchange them for a size 6. Actually, I could use a size 5. Not sure what's going on, but I really do love these slippers and will continue to buy them when these wear out. I especially love the soles which are sturdy enough to wear outside even in inclement weather. Great slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My previous pairs (in many colors) lasted way longer and didn't stretch out like this at all (though they do loosen up just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this style of UGG slippers for years. I highly suspect these are not authentic. They stretched out within weeks so that they are way too loose for my feet, and within 2 months the fur was completely worn off the heel (previous pairs took a year to do this). My previous pairs (in many colors) lasted way longer and didn't stretch out like this at all (though they do loosen up just a bit.) This makes them not worth the price at all in my book. Too late to do anything now. I feel completely ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Terrible construction.
customer_reviews.text: This product fell apart with very minimal wear indoors. The fur around the top began to fall off. Then the inside of the footbed wore off. I bought these because they were extremely comfortable. I would never pay this much for slippers normally. But when they fall apart with about 100 uses, forget it. I will never buy an Ugg product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Ugg’s quality has gone down!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of this slipper in black. I have enjoyed them as no other slipper I’ve ever had. So I decided to buy another pair in the lighter color in the same size. However I’ve been so disappointed as they are not made nearly as well as my first pair and slip around on my foot. They are far too expensive to leave on the shelf in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: I would rate these even lower if it would allow me. The first pair I got started falling apart within a week. I returned them for a second pair. Hoping id just gotten a bad pair. I’ve had these three months and the fur inside is nearly gone. These are fakes. I’ve never had real Ugg’s fall apart like this. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MRE4063

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I try to buy a new pair every winter. They are a wonderful slipper. Soft and warm with a good sole for going outside if you have to. I wear them every day around the house (but NEVER to Walmart).
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: These are Knockoffs!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my wife for xmas she had a pair a few years ago so we know what to looks for and compare to . These have a soft foam Botton not hard rubber like before the leather is thing cheap trash and the fur is thin this is not lamb skin! 100 pct fake shoe what a joke .
customer_reviews.author: Mario Sarrica

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have several other pairs of UGG slippers, and I am not convinced these are authentic. They are nice and very lightweight, but too expensive if they are not a UGG product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I miss my original UGGs!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of UGGs which I love (apparently no longer available in sand). Sadly, they did not fit as well as the previous UGGs. They are so loose and don't feel like the originals. I am so disappointed as these triggered my plantar fasciitis which I have not had in years. I will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 1/2 or 8 shoe. I had 2 extra inches at the heel. They would have fit my husband that wears an 9 1/2 or 10. I've ordered UGG products before and never had this problem. I would check authenticity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bungee

customer_reviews.title: I have had this product and style before; they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product and style before; they work well for me. Although the fur seems to have changed and does not feel as 'thick/condensed' as it has before, which will make the shoe (fur) flatten and wear off a lot sooner. I have my pair from several years and I can see that the fur on the new show is more of a poly/blend and not as luxurious as my old slippers. I was saddened to see that change.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Black Ugg Coquette major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal fan of this Ugg slipper style for many many years. This is the first pair that has been a complete disappointment. They are lacking the quality of sherling in thickness and texture. This pair has shed like I’ve never experienced and the dye transfers causing my feet to stain. My last seasson’s sand colored pair are more cozy even after a year of compression. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: HealthnutFashionista

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality....
customer_reviews.text: I love UGG products. However these slippers are very large. My boots (I have two pair) are size 8. These size 7 slippers are the same size as my size 8 boots. The fleece lining is thinner than the fleece lining in my boots (they are 2 years old). Sooo the question is now that they are making these things in Vietnam is the quality going down hill. Time will tell......
customer_reviews.author: Lin Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not Ugg quality
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the same style Ugg slippers for more than 15 years. These were not Ugg. I returned them and went to Nordstrom to buy the real deal. Very disappointed especially when I consider how many people purchased these knock-offs and will never know the tremendous difference.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but runs large
customer_reviews.text: They’re quite comfortable. I’ve had them before so knew how large they run. I wear a size 8 shoe and a 6 in these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: POOR Quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the older Ugg quality. I've only had these for two months and the fur is such poor quality it's already worn thin and the lining exposed on the inside of the heel. I can even feel the hard rubber sole. Im only 140lbs and wear them a couple hours a day at most. Even the soles are wearing down. The pictures compare the fur from original Uggs I've had for 30 years to these new ones and it's so obvious the quality is not there anymore, they used to be so thick and plush. They also run very large i had to return my normal size 8 for a 7 and they're still large.
customer_reviews.author: the p.

customer_reviews.title: loved how warm they were and the rugged sole
customer_reviews.text: I wore out a pair of these, loved how warm they were and the rugged sole. This new pair I ordered is not the same slipper. They have been cheapened but the price hasn't changed. The sole is not as rigid as in the old pair but it is much thinner. And the fluffy part is not nearly as warm - I think it is a synthetic material now. I will never buy another Ugg product since I was cheated and deceived.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I take a size 12 or 12.5 shoe and the 12 UGG fits beautifully. It is very warm and comfortable. I work my other UGGs for many years until there was no fur left so purchased these. I see that others have left comments that the fur tends to disappear quickly. Cannot speak to that as I have only had these a week. Will continue to purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: theredhelmet

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UGG SLIPPERS!
customer_reviews.text: These are FAKE UGG slippers! VERY CHEAPLY MADE!!! The price was the same as the authentic slippers. Do not order these. I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Reata

customer_reviews.title: Seemed different
customer_reviews.text: After receiving I thought these werea little lighter than my other slippers. Their labels are different, but I also had my shoes almost 10 years! After comparing the two I decided to send them back as I wasn’t for sure if they were authentic. The new pair I have are the light tan ones and in comparison to the purple, they are exactly the same right down to the tags on the inside of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: amzingrl

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pregnant DIL who had previously bought three pairs of slippers with no luck. She has raved and raved about these. Swears she’s wearing them to the hospital to have her little one!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela N

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these as a gift for my friend recovering from surgery. I loved them so much I bought another pair for myself. I'm not that in love with Uggs but I do LOVE these! The red is sooooo pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah404

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy pair.
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous pairs of UGG BOOTS AND SIPPERS. I have never had a problem until now. Idk if they are skimping on the shearling and lining but I only bought these and got the at the end of May and the undone in one is already down to the base. The shearling is literally gone. I have never had this problem with others. After 3+ years it happens but not even 2 full months a d u only wear them at night. I want my money backor a replacement pair. This should not happen so soon. Even a new insert would be great but this is completely unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Picchi1

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Slippers EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I'm at home these are on my feet, period. I've been wearing them for more than a decade now (have had at least 8 pairs) and as long as Ugg makes them, I'll continue to buy them. Having good quality slippers is just as important as having good quality shoes. If your feet hurt, everything hurts and these slippers help in relieving the pain. A bit pricey, but definitely worth it. If this is your first Ugg Slippers purchase prepare for them to change your life!
customer_reviews.author: Leighanne

customer_reviews.title: Wore out after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The inside sole wore down after 2 months. Amazon won’t deal with the replacement and sent me to UGGs website. Once there I find out I will only receive a store credit for replacement value. Long story short I bought these as a gift at full price for someone undergoing chemo and she really doesn’t want to be without them while UGGs figures out if we’re worthy for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: 74prospect

customer_reviews.title: Larger than sized...
customer_reviews.text: These slippers run about one entire size larger than normal. So if you wear a size 9, get a size 8 and they will fit. I have a very wide foot and these work for me and I have neuropathy in my feet and can't have tight slippers so these work for that too and they do have good cushion like Uggs do. I like them, but I had to send them back to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: UGG slippers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable, soft and durable. Very happy with my purchase. They are definitely my go to slippers. They keep your feet so warm. Bought a pair for my daughter as well and she loves hers!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Tiner

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: If you want FAKE slippers then absolutely purchase these! I bought these for my girlfriend who always wears Ugg, it’s safe to say when she opened these it was clear they weren’t up to the quality she knows and loves. Upon touch the fur literally sheds off and they are so obviously fake that I might as well have made them myself. PLEASE save yourself both time and money and DO NOT BUY these. I know it appears that “ugg” is the seller but if you take a second look they have third parties they are selling through. You should go to the Dollar Store if you want a better pair of slippers than these!
customer_reviews.author: mfatse

customer_reviews.title: A super pair of slippers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ugg! I was looking for a very comfortable pair of slippers. These are super soft, and keep your feet warm. They have hard, slip resistant soles which makes them perfect for harder surface floors (my case, tiled floor). I wear them all the time and love them. They fit to size. If you're looking for a great pair of solidly made slippers these are them! I highly recommend Ugg slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have had these slippers for less than a month, wearing daily in our home. The fur has worn through at the heel already. Have had a similar pair of UGG slippers before and they lasted years. These seem extremely light weight and not as durable. I would almost think they are an imposter pair. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: They are Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: This is what my granddaughter wanted for her Birthday and she wears them just about all the time! I wouldn't spend this kind of money for "slippers" for myself, but they seem to be great.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ VA

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of this style that I have owned. I wear them inside and they have good support and don’t slip which is important because I have balance problems. They keep my feet warm and are easy to put on when I get up at night. This slipper runs wide and long, I normally wear a 6 and a half or 7 and the size 6 is a little big but the size 5 is too small.
customer_reviews.author: ams15726

customer_reviews.title: Quality not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I have had, the first pair was a birthday gift 10 years ago. The “old” pair are still going strong and have become my house working uggs and are definitely worn. But this new pair I purchased on Jan 7, 2020 have already lost the lining in the heel and on the ball inside of one of the shoes. The other shoe isn’t far behind. The sole is must softer than the “old” pair as well. It’s very disappointing to say the least. Clearly the quality has changed drastically over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie C

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy! Fake!!
customer_reviews.text: After ONLY 1 month the inside lining is wearing off!! I find it hard to believe these slippers are true Uggs!
customer_reviews.author: debbie endicott

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Genuine UGGs..always wear a size smaller in this style..so worth the money..wear summer & winter..
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had my UGG slippers for less then 3 months and the fur inside wore off. The outside of the slippers wore fine. I really wish the UGG slippers were the same quality as my UGG boots that I have had for over 10 years and are still in good shape. Disappointed the slippers didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: sandpug

customer_reviews.title: Slipper is defective and fur is inferior
customer_reviews.text: 10-1-2018 After buying UGG coquette slippers for many years and being totally satisfied, I must complain about this most recent pair. I noticed immediately when I opened the package that the fur is different. In this case different equates to inferior. Clumps of fur are falling out of the footbed on one after only a few weeks. These slippers were delivered on August 22, 2018 and Amazon allows a return only thru September 23, 2018. They cost $119.00! HELP, I need resolution! The review cannot be submitted without selecting at least one star, otherwise I would have given no star.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Zanzonico

customer_reviews.title: Thin lining--shame on UGG for stooping to such poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Every year the quality of UGGs gets worse. I was appalled at how thin the interior lining of this slipper was. I've probably had 15 pair of this style of UGG slipper over the years, and wish I had never ordered this one. They are so thinly lined that my feet slide around inside. I am super annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: T. D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I am relatively certain that the shoes I received were fake. There was a lot of loose fluff coming off of them. I ordered another pair directly from UGG, and there was no loose fuzz. Also, the pair I got directly from UGG had much thicker wool on the foot beds than the ones I got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy B

customer_reviews.title: UGG Slippers! The best !
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Love how they feel walking around on tile floors all day and night! Very comfortable! Great color too ❗️
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Mothers day gift
customer_reviews.text: She loved them, the color is closer to taupe than purple but definitely has a purple hue. The bottom is good grip for my mom who is always popping outdoors and back indoors. They're cute!
customer_reviews.author: TF

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Coquette Slipper
product_meta.description: Take your self-care seriously with this slipper. As soft as it is versatile, the Coquette features our soft sheepskin and a lightweight sole that travels both indoors and out with ease.
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep, Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia
Shaft measures approximately not_applicable" from arch
Treadlite by UGG outsole for comfort
